taskDescription: Drag images from the left to match them with corresponding images on the right

cards.matchAlt: resources belonging to or affecting the whole of a community.
the exclusive right, given to an originator to print, publish, perform, film, or record literary, artistic, or musical material.
a work or invention that is the result of creativity, such as a manuscript or a design
a government authority or license conferring a right or title for a set period, especially the sole right to exclude others from making, using, or selling an invention.
a symbol, word, or words legally registered or established by use as representing a company or product.
